summary: Provides core cryptographic utilities for the mock KMS service, including abstract and concrete privateâ€‘key handling for RSA and ECDSA, predefined key specifications and signing algorithms, generation of master and data keys, and serialization/deserialization of ciphertext blobs for encryption and decryption workflows.
business_intent: Emulates AWS KMS cryptographic behavior to enable testing of key management, encryption/decryption, and signing operations without contacting the real service.
